arguments.comment: SIEM query identified a Compiled HTML file spawning child process {{vars.item._source.image_path.split("\\")[-1] }} on {{vars.item._source.beat.hostname}} at {{vars.item._source.event_data.UtcTime}}.
arguments.description: An attempt by hh.exe to spawn a process was observed. Hh.exe can be used to execute compiled HTML (.chm) files. An adversary could craft a custom malicious .chm file and trick a user into executing it, potentially infecting the host. Any process spawned by hh.exe should be analyzed for malicious activity.

arguments.comment: SIEM query identified a Compiled HTML file spawning child process {{vars.item.process_exec}} on {{vars.item.host}} at {{vars.item.UtcTime}}.
arguments.description: An attempt by hh.exe to spawn a process was observed. Hh.exe can be used to execute compiled HTML (.chm) files. An adversary could craft a custom malicious .chm file and trick a user into executing it, potentially infecting the host. Any process spawned by hh.exe should be analyzed for malicious activity.

steps.name: Elastic Query for Sysmon Compiled HTML

arguments.name: ElasticSearch

params.query: event_type:sysmon AND event_id:"1" AND @timestamp:{ {{vars.elasticHuntStart}} TO {{vars.elasticHuntEnd}} } AND parent_image_path:"C:\\windows\\hh.exe"
